title: Practical Applications
content:
Real-World Use Cases

Applications highlighted in your paper collection:

  • Computer Vision: Object detection, image segmentation, visual understanding
  • Natural Language Processing: Translation, summarization, question answering
  • Recommendation Systems: Collaborative filtering, content-based approaches
  • Healthcare: Diagnosis, treatment optimization, medical imaging

Implementation Challenges

  • Data Quality: Handling noisy, missing data
  • Scalability: Methods for large datasets
  • Interpretability: Making models explainable

Evaluation Methods

Approaches from your materials for rigorously evaluating model performance in real-world settings.

Resources

Paper collection - Real-world applications and case studies of ML deployment
